title: Machine Learning for Business Analytics
description: Learn how to apply machine learning algorithms to solve real business problems. Cover regression classification clustering and data visualization techniques for business insights.

title: Introduction to Python Programming
description: Master Python fundamentals including variables data types loops functions and object-oriented programming. Perfect for absolute beginners.

title: Advanced Deep Learning with PyTorch
description: Deep dive into neural networks CNNs RNNs transformers and advanced architectures. Build production-ready deep learning models with PyTorch.

title: Web Development with React and Node.js
description: Build full-stack web applications using React for frontend and Node.js for backend. Learn REST APIs authentication and database integration.

title: Data Structures and Algorithms in Java
description: Master essential data structures arrays linked lists trees graphs and algorithms sorting searching dynamic programming for technical interviews.

title: Cloud Computing with AWS
description: Learn Amazon Web Services including EC2 S3 Lambda RDS and cloud architecture best practices. Deploy scalable cloud applications.

title: Natural Language Processing Fundamentals
description: Explore NLP techniques including tokenization embeddings sentiment analysis named entity recognition and transformer models like BERT and GPT.

title: Mobile App Development with Flutter
description: Build beautiful cross-platform mobile applications for iOS and Android using Flutter and Dart. Learn widgets state management and API integration.

title: Cybersecurity Essentials
description: Understand cybersecurity fundamentals including network security cryptography ethical hacking and security best practices for protecting systems.

title: Business Intelligence with Power BI
description: Create interactive dashboards and reports using Power BI. Learn data modeling DAX formulas and storytelling with data for business decision making.
